datasource.data_def: {label: "deleterious", data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(200,0,0)"}
datasource.label: deleterious

datasource.data_def: {label: "neutral", data: d2, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(0,0,200)"}
datasource.label: neutral

datasource.data_def: {label: "favorable", data: d3, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(0,200,0)"}
datasource.label: favorable

plots.options: legend: { position: 'nw' }, xaxis: { min: 1.0, axisLabel: 'Generations', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, yaxis: { axisLabel: 'Mutations', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Average mutations/individual

datasource.data_def: {label: "fitness", data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(200,0,0)"}
datasource.label: fitness

datasource.data_def: {label: 'pop size', data: d2, lines: { show: true}, color: 'rgb(0,0,255)', yaxis: 2, position: 'right'}
datasource.label: pop size

plots.options: xaxes: [ { axisLabel: 'Generations', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 } ],  yaxes: [ { min: 0, axisLabel: 'Fitness', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, { position: 'right', min: 0, axisLabel: 'Population Size', axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12} ], legend: { position: 'se'}, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: 'xy' }
plots.title: Fitness history
